name: Space Alconaut
description:
The Space Alconaut trying to survive in a spaceship that's too unstable...  First person logic game. Use arrows or WASD (Move) and Mouse (Left Click - Action & Right Click Drink). Spacebar - Jump.

Game by Vladimir Frolov (Volkolak), Vasiliy Fokin (Bassilij)

If you find some bugs or have any questions please contact us at:
